saved_items, product_reviews, sales_cart, sales_order, catalog_wishlist, user_addresses
Standardize ID naming, ensure updated_at triggers exist.
Type Standardization: Ensure all Primary and Foreign keys use the same data type (e.g., all BIGINT).
Soft Deletes: Implement deleted_at for core entities like Users and Products.
Audit Trails: Consistent created_at and updated_at across all active tables.
JSONB usage: For flexible attributes, consider PostgreSQL JSONB for better performance.
